page.title: 06HOUSES
page.content: Most of the houses in and aroud{ {Kemble}are made of{Cotswold}stone and tiles. There are lots of farm cottages that were built for the workers who used to work on the farms. Now the cottages are being sold because there are not as many farm workers as there used to be. In{Poole Keynes}and{Kemble there are quite a few council houses which were built between the wars. The new houses have been built of { {Cotswold}stone or reconstituted stone so that they fit in with the old buildings. Most of the gardens are surrounded by dry-stone walls which are built and repaired by local craftsmen.
